languages.text: "Хм. Готи, а я ведь тебя видел. Ты прислуживала проклятой немочи Тервантьясу. Не по вкусу тебе милость ксеносская, раз решилась на побег?"
"Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you choose to run away?"
languages.original_text: "Хм. Готи, а я ведь тебя видел. Ты прислуживала проклятой немочи Тервантьясу. Не по вкусу тебе милость ксеносская, раз решилась на побег?"

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you chose to run away?"
"Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you chose to run away?"
"Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you chose to run away?"
"Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you chose to run away?"

languages.text: “嗯……萨满，我见过你，你之前服侍那个该死的特万提亚斯。莫非是因为异形的仁慈不合你心意，于是你逃跑了？”
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you choose to run away?"

traits.locale_text: “嗯……萨满，我见过你，你之前服侍那个该死的特万提亚斯。莫非是因为异形的仁慈不合你心意，于是你逃跑了？”

languages.text: « Hum... Je vous ai déjà vue. Vous étiez au service de ce scélérat de Tervantias. La miséricorde des xénos, ou tout du moins leur idée de la miséricorde, n'était donc pas à votre goût pour que vous décidiez de fuir ? »
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you choose to run away?"

traits.locale_text: « Hum... Je vous ai déjà vue. Vous étiez au service de ce scélérat de Tervantias. La miséricorde des xénos, ou tout du moins leur idée de la miséricorde, n'était donc pas à votre goût pour que vous décidiez de fuir ? »

languages.text: «Te he visto, gothi. Estabas al servicio de ese maldito excremento llamado Tervantias. ¿Acaso el concepto xenos de la compasión no te agradó y elegiste huir?».
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you choose to run away?"

traits.locale_text: «Te he visto, gothi. Estabas al servicio de ese maldito excremento llamado Tervantias. ¿Acaso el concepto xenos de la compasión no te agradó y elegiste huir?».

languages.text: 「ふむ。ゴティよ、お前を見かけたぞ。あの忌々しいくそ野郎のテルヴァンティアスに仕えてたな。異種族は慈悲を好まない、それで逃げ出すことを選んだのか？」
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you choose to run away?"

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ。ゴティよ、お前を見かけたぞ。あの忌々しいくそ野郎のテルヴァンティアスに仕えてたな。異種族は慈悲を好まない、それで逃げ出すことを選んだのか？」

languages.text: "Hmm. Gothi, ich habe Euch gesehen. Ihr habt diesem verfluchten Exkrement Tervantias gedient. War das Xenos-Konzept der Gnade nicht nach Eurem Geschmack, also seid Ihr stattdessen geflohen?"
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you choose to run away?"

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. Gothi, ich habe Euch gesehen. Ihr habt diesem verfluchten Exkrement Tervantias gedient. War das Xenos-Konzept der Gnade nicht nach Eurem Geschmack, also seid Ihr stattdessen geflohen?"

languages.original_text: "Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you chose to run away?"

languages.text: "Hımm. Seni daha önce görmüştüm gothi. Aşağılık Tervantias'a hizmet ediyordun. Zenoların merhamet mefhumu sana uymadığı için kaçmaya mı karar verdin?"
languages.original_text: "Hmm. Gothi, I have seen you. You served that cursed excrement Tervantias. Was the xenos notion of mercy not to your liking, so you choose to run away?"

traits.locale_text: "Hımm. Seni daha önce görmüştüm gothi. O lanetli pislik Tervantias'a hizmet ediyordun. Zenoların merhamet mefhumu sana uymadığı için kaçmaya mı karar verdin?"
